name: PARALISIS
description:
This originally had like a whole plot about paralisis demons and stuff but I did not have time for that- Still liked the name so I just kept it

This was a game for a game jam! Wow! I did this in around a week! It is barely playable but I did it so hell yeah. I am very much aware of certain bugs but again there is no time, maybe I'll patch it up after the game jam 

Added a downloadable version for windows in case the html one decides to explode
